name: UpdateOrCreateSnippet
description:
Update or create a snippet with a unique name.

Use this tool to update an existing snippet or create a new one. Pass a unique `name` and corresponding `value`. If the snippet already exists, its value will be updated; otherwise, a new snippet will be created.

parameters.name: snippet_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the unique snippet name and its value. Provide 'name' for the snippet identifier and 'value' for the snippet content, and optionally 'updated_at' for the last update timestamp.

name.description: The name of the snippet, must be unique.

updated_at.description: The last date-time the snippet was updated.
